Part.Source:
Event Start
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
&BookmarkURL = &InBookmarkURL &BookmarkName = &BookmarkPageDescription
&GridStateCollection.FromXml(LoadManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks")) &i = 1 For &GridStateCollectionItem in &GridStateCollection If &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML = &BookmarkURL &ProgramDescription = &GridStateCollectionItem.Title Exit Else &i += 1 EndIf EndFor If &i > &GridStateCollection.Count BtnDel.Visible = False Form.Caption = "WWP_Bookmark_Add" Else Form.Caption = "WWP_Bookmark_Edit" EndIf
EndEvent
Event 'DoDel'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
&GridStateCollection.FromXml(LoadManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks")) If &i <= &GridStateCollection.Count &GridStateCollection.Remove(&i) SaveManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks", &GridStateCollection.ToXml()) GlobalEvents.Master_RefreshHeader() WWPActions.WCPopup_Close('') EndIf
EndEvent
Event Enter
&BookmarkName = &BookmarkName.Trim() If &BookmarkName.IsEmpty() msg('Empty') Else &GridStateCollection.FromXml(LoadManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks")) &IsNameUnique = True For &GridStateCollectionItem in &GridStateCollection If &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML = &BookmarkURL &IsEdit = true Endif EndFor
If &IsEdit For &GridStateCollectionItem in &GridStateCollection If &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML = &BookmarkURL &GridStateCollectionItem.Title = &BookmarkName Endif EndFor Else &GridStateCollectionItem = new() &GridStateCollectionItem.Title = &BookmarkName &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML = &BookmarkURL &GridStateCollection.Add(&GridStateCollectionItem, 1) Endif SaveManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks", &GridStateCollection.ToXml()) GlobalEvents.Master_RefreshHeader() WWPActions.WCPopup_Close('') EndIf
EndEvent
Event 'DoUserCancel'
WWPActions.WCPopup_Close('')
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent

For &DVelop_MenuItem in &DVelop_Menu If &DVelop_MenuItem.link = &LinkToFind &FontIcon = &DVelop_MenuItem.iconClass Exit Else &FontIcon = GetBookmarkFontIcon(&LinkToFind, &DVelop_MenuItem.subItems) If &FontIcon <> '' Exit EndIf EndIf EndFor

Event Start Form.HeaderRawHTML = !'' LayoutMainTable.Class = ThemeClass:MainContainerWithFooter &DVelop_Menu = MenuOptionsData() /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ ddo_Bookmarks.Tooltip = 'WWP_Bookmark_Tooltip' ddo_Bookmarks.TitleControlAlign = !"Left" ActionSearch.Enabled = False EndEvent Event 'DoShowMenu' UCMenu.CollapseExpand() EndEvent Event ddo_LanguagesIcons.OnOptionClicked /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ EndEvent Event Refresh TextblockTitle.Caption = Form.Caption LoadBreadcrumb(&DVelop_Menu, &HttpRequest.ScriptName, &Breadcrumb, False) If &Breadcrumb.Trim().IsEmpty() &Breadcrumb = &WebSession.Get(!"LastBreadcrumb") Else &WebSession.Set(!"LastBreadcrumb", &Breadcrumb) Endif Subtitle.Caption = iif(&Breadcrumb.IsEmpty(), Format(!'%1', ContentHolder.Pgmdesc, ThemeClass:BreadCrumb), &Breadcrumb) Do 'LoadBookmarks' EndEvent Event GlobalEvents.Master_RefreshHeader() Refresh EndEvent Sub 'LoadBookmarks' &BookmarksData = new() &BookmarksDataItem = new() &BookmarksDataItem.EventKey = !'AddBookmark' &BookmarksDataItem.IsDivider = False &BookmarksData.Add(&BookmarksDataItem) &ProgramDescription = ContentHolder.Pgmdesc &CurrentURL = &HttpRequest.BaseUrl + &HttpRequest.ScriptName + iif(&HttpRequest.QueryString.Trim().IsEmpty(), '', !'?' + &HttpRequest.QueryString) &GridStateCollection.FromXml(LoadManageFiltersState(!"AppBookmarks")) &BookmarkFound = False For &GridStateCollectionItem in &GridStateCollection If &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML = &CurrentURL &ProgramDescription = &GridStateCollectionItem.Title &BookmarkFound = True Exit EndIf EndFor If &BookmarkFound DDo_Bookmarks.Update('', !"fas fa-star " + ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmarkTitleAdded) &BookmarksDataItem.Title = "WWP_Bookmark_Edit" &BookmarksDataItem.FontIcon = !"fas fa-star " + ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmarkAdded Else DDo_Bookmarks.Update('', !"far fa-star " + ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmarkTitle) &BookmarksDataItem.Title = "WWP_Bookmark_Add" &BookmarksDataItem.FontIcon = !"far fa-star " + ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmark Endif If &GridStateCollection.Count > 0 &BookmarksDataItem = new() &BookmarksDataItem.IsDivider = True &BookmarksData.Add(&BookmarksDataItem) For &GridStateCollectionItem in &GridStateCollection &BookmarksDataItem = new() &BookmarksDataItem.Title = &GridStateCollectionItem.Title &BookmarksDataItem.Link = &GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML &FontIcon = GetBookmarkFontIcon(&GridStateCollectionItem.GridStateXML.Replace(&HttpRequest.BaseUrl, ""), &DVelop_Menu) &BookmarksDataItem.FontIcon = iif(&FontIcon = "", !"FontColorIconBookmark fas fa-link", ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmark + !" " + &FontIcon) &BookmarksDataItem.IsDivider = False &BookmarksData.Add(&BookmarksDataItem) &IndexToAddItems += 1 EndFor &BookmarksDataItem = new() &BookmarksDataItem.IsDivider = True &BookmarksData.Add(&BookmarksDataItem) &BookmarksDataItem = new() &BookmarksDataItem.Title = 'Bookmark manager' &BookmarksDataItem.FontIcon = !"fas fa-cog " + ThemeClass:FontColorIconBookmark &BookmarksDataItem.EventKey = !'ManageBookmarks' &BookmarksDataItem.IsDivider = False &BookmarksData.Add(&BookmarksDataItem) EndIf EndSub Event ddo_Bookmarks.OnOptionClicked /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ Do Case Case ddo_Bookmarks.ActiveEventKey = !'AddBookmark' Bookmark_Modal.Confirm() Case ddo_Bookmarks.ActiveEventKey = !'ManageBookmarks' ManageFilters.Popup(!"AppBookmarks") EndCase EndEvent Event Popover_Search.OnLoadComponent ActionSearch.Enabled = True /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ EndEvent Event 'DoActionSearch' WWP_Search(&SearchAux, false, '') EndEvent Event Popover_Search.OnClose ActionSearch.Enabled = False &SearchAux = &Search &Search.SetEmpty() EndEvent

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWorkWithPlusMasterPage
Object.description: Work With Plus Work With Plus Master Page

Part.Source:
//This is a procedure in which user has to define how to load information related to each end user //By default it loads the ColumnsSelector State, the Grid State (filters, orders, etc) and Filters within 'ManageFilters' Action
If &UserCustomizationsValue.IsEmpty() &Session.Remove(&UserCustomizationsKey) Else &Session.Set(&UserCustomizationsKey, &UserCustomizationsValue) EndIf

&MenuOptionFounded = False For &DVelop_Menu_Item In &DVelop_Menu If &DVelop_Menu_Item.link.ToLower().Trim() = &MenuOptionToFind.ToLower().Trim() &Breadcrumb = Format(!'%1', &DVelop_Menu_Item.caption) &MenuOptionFounded = true Exit Else LoadBreadCrumb(&DVelop_Menu_Item.subItems, &MenuOptionToFind, &Breadcrumb, &MenuOptionFounded) If &MenuOptionFounded &Breadcrumb = Format(!'%1%2', &DVelop_Menu_Item.caption, &Breadcrumb, ThemeClass:BreadCrumb, ThemeClass:BreadCrumbIcon) Exit Endif EndIf EndFor

Object.name: WorkWithPlusWWP_MasterPageTopActionsWC
Object.description: Work With Plus WWP_Master Page Top Actions WC
